title: Smiles
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Pizza, Italian, Organic, Raw, Mediterranean, Delivery, Take-out only
description: Takeaway located a few steps from the lake side, opened by a husband and wife team in Jul 2015. Vegan, vegetarian, and raw organic cuisine to take out. On the menu are wraps, pizza, piadine, focacce, salad, crepes, smoothies, coffee, and desserts.
